      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) boolean getDocumentFromDownload(java.lang.String bookFileName, android.widget.EditText editText)
      2nd function call for importing a book Creates a File object based on the provided bookFileName from a file in the downloads folder for use in the next function call
      protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState) 
      void onEnter(android.view.View view)
      1st call that resolves for importing a book which will attempt to make a copy of a file from the downloads directory and place it into the app's local directory If successful it will also add that book's file name to the assets.dat file in the local directory
      (package private) java.io.File readFileFromDirectory(java.lang.String name)
      Returns a file with the same name as the String from the local directory

      3rd function call for importing a book Copies the book associated with bookFile to the local directory

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)

      • onEnter

        public void onEnter(android.view.View view)
        1st call that resolves for importing a book which will attempt to make a copy of a file from the downloads directory and place it into the app's local directory If successful it will also add that book's file name to the assets.dat file in the local directory
        Parameters:
        view - the view of the current text model

      • getDocumentFromDownload

        boolean getDocumentFromDownload(java.lang.String bookFileName,
                                android.widget.EditText editText)
        2nd function call for importing a book Creates a File object based on the provided bookFileName from a file in the downloads folder for use in the next function call
        Parameters:
        bookFileName - the string representing the file name of the desired book
        editText - the EditText from the associated xml based display
        Returns:
        function returns a boolean which will be true if the book was successfully copied and false otherwise

      • writeFileToAppDirectory

        boolean writeFileToAppDirectory(java.io.File bookFile,
                                java.lang.String bookFileName,
                                android.content.Context c,
                                android.widget.EditText editText)
        3rd function call for importing a book Copies the book associated with bookFile to the local directory
        Parameters:
        bookFileName - the string representing the file name of the desired book
        editText - the EditText from the associated xml based display
        bookFile - A File object that is associated with the desired file in the downloads folder
        c - The context for the current activity
        Returns:
        function returns a boolean which will be true if the book was successfully copied and false otherwise

      • readFileFromDirectory

        java.io.File readFileFromDirectory(java.lang.String name)
        Returns a file with the same name as the String from the local directory
        Parameters:
        name - String which holds the filename to pull from local directory
        Returns:
        A File object for the file in the local directory if successful, otherwise returns null
